item.description:
Hi Everyone,

 

Just for this week I have rescheduled our Wednesday knit nite to Tuesday, tomorrow, August 7th.

Wednesday the 8th is my birthday and my family asked me to reschedule our knit nite so they could take me out to celebrate.

 

I hope this isn't too late for people to change their plans and I hope those of you who were planning on coming Wednesday can make it tomorrow nite.  Otherwise, I will see you on Wednesday, August 15th.

 

Thank you for your understanding!

 

Donna
item.name: Wednesday Night Knitting
